title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. K, pt. 479 - Disciplinary Action
content:

§ 479.1 - Reports of accusations

§ 479.5 - Preparation of charges
§ 479.6 - Acknowledgment of charges by accused member

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. K, pt. 479

Statutory authority: Executive Law, § 215[3]; Public Officers

Law, §87 [1-b]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
